EmailTemplate.description: Test Email Template - Cancelled Meeting from Forecasted
EmailTemplate.name: Cancelled Meeting
EmailTemplate.subject: Meeting has been cancelled
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Meeting_MERC__c.Prmry_Mtng_Ownr_Nm_MERC__c},
The forecasted meeting "{!Meeting_MERC__c.Name}", scheduled for {!Meeting_MERC__c.Date_of_Event_MERC__c} in {!Meeting_MERC__c.Event_Country_MERC__c} has been cancelled.
More information regarding this meeting can be found at {!Meeting_MERC__c.Link}.
